DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to assess the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of aripiprazole tablets following oral administration to children and adolescents.
DOC.brief_title: Aripiprazole Pharmacokinetics (PK) and Tolerability Study in Children and Adolescents
